title: Hult Prize 2025
description: The world's largest student competition for social entrepreneurship. Students compete to solve pressing global issues with scalable business ideas, with winning team receiving $1M USD in seed funding. The 2025 challenge theme is 'UNLIMITED' - any idea for a social enterprise aligned with UN SDGs.
targetAudience: University students (undergraduate and graduate) aged 18+ forming teams of 2-4 members

title: Youth Co:Lab National Innovation Challenge 2025
description: UNDP and AIM's annual challenge empowering young entrepreneurs to develop innovative solutions enhancing access and well-being for Persons with Disabilities. Focus on assistive technology, educational technology, and inclusive care models with seed grants for winners.
organizer: UNDP, AIM NITI Aayog, Citi Foundation
targetAudience: Youth entrepreneurs aged 18-32 working on disability-inclusive solutions, including entrepreneurs with disabilities

title: Youth Ideathon 2025 (College)
description: India's premier innovation and entrepreneurship competition for college students. Joint initiative by IIT Delhi, MEPSC, and ThinkStartup focusing on innovative ideas across 10 key sectors including technology, medicine, education, and social impact.
targetAudience: College students from Indian universities pursuing undergraduate or postgraduate programs in teams of 3-5 members

title: Startup Grind Global Pitch Battle 2025
description: World's top emerging startups compete for global recognition in this multi-stage competition. Features local chapter battles, virtual semi-finals, and global finals with prizes including exhibition packages at Startup Grind Conference in Silicon Valley.
nonMonetaryRewards: Premium exhibition space at Startup Grind Conference
targetAudience: Tech-driven startups with scalable business models and MVP or live product

title: Empresario 2025 Global Business Model Competition
description: IIT Kharagpur's annual business model competition featuring multiple tracks including Products & Services, Social Impact, Web 3.0, and IIT KGP exclusive tracks. Provides mentorship from seasoned entrepreneurs and opportunities to pitch to VCs and investors.
targetAudience: Students and early-stage entrepreneurs with innovative business models across various sectors

title: Supernova Challenge 2.0
description: World's largest early-stage startup pitch competition held at Expand North Star Dubai. Features virtual qualifiers, semi-finals, and finals with equity-free prize pool. Participants must be exhibiting startups at GITEX events.
organizer: Dubai World Trade Centre, Dubai Chamber
targetAudience: Early-stage startups exhibiting at Expand North Star, Fintech Surge, or GITEX Impact events

title: Foodtech Frontier Challenge 2025
description: Global innovation challenge bringing together startups and food industry players to develop breakthrough solutions in ingredients, processing, and sustainability. Focus on taste, texture, nutrition, and sustainability innovations for the future of food.
targetAudience: Foodtech startups and SMEs worldwide looking to collaborate with food industry leaders

title: Vibrant Gujarat Startup & Tech Summit
description: Biennial startup and technology summit focused on innovation across multiple sectors. Part of the larger Vibrant Gujarat Global Summit, featuring startup competitions, investor meetings, and technology showcases with emphasis on Gujarat's innovation ecosystem.
targetAudience: Startups, entrepreneurs, and technology companies looking for investment and partnerships in Gujarat

title: Samsung Solve for Tomorrow
description: Global competition encouraging students to solve real-world problems through STEAM (Science, Technology, Engineering, Arts, Mathematics) education and innovation. Focus on addressing pressing social issues through technology solutions.
targetAudience: Students and educators focused on STEAM learning and social impact solutions

title: TIE Young Entrepreneurship Program
description: Global program by TiE (The Indus Entrepreneurs) designed to nurture young entrepreneurial talent. Provides mentorship, funding opportunities, and network access to help young entrepreneurs build successful ventures.
targetAudience: Young entrepreneurs and startup founders looking for mentorship and network access

title: Seedstars World Competition
description: Global startup competition for emerging markets. Identifies and supports early-stage startups from emerging markets through local events, culminating in a global summit where startups compete for investment.
targetAudience: Early-stage startups from emerging markets with scalable business models

title: Asia Pacific Entrepreneurship Awards (APEA)
description: Prestigious regional awards recognizing outstanding entrepreneurial achievements across Asia Pacific. Celebrates successful entrepreneurs and their contributions to economic development and innovation in the region.
targetAudience: Established entrepreneurs and business leaders in Asia Pacific region

title: India Sustainability Startathon
description: Innovation challenge focused on sustainability solutions for India. Encourages startups to develop scalable solutions addressing environmental and social challenges while building sustainable business models. Winners get fully-funded trip to Singapore.
nonMonetaryRewards: Fully-funded trip to Singapore for ASEAN-China-India Youth Leadership Summit
targetAudience: Startups and entrepreneurs working on sustainability solutions for Indian market

title: Unilever Young Entrepreneurs Awards
description: Global awards program recognizing young entrepreneurs who are creating positive social impact through their business ventures. Part of One Young World summit focusing on sustainable business practices.
targetAudience: Young entrepreneurs (18-30) creating positive social and environmental impact through business

title: Startup India Seed Fund Scheme
description: Government of India initiative providing seed funding to startups for proof of concept, prototype development, product trials, market entry and commercialization. Aims to support early-stage startups with funding and mentorship.
targetAudience: Early-stage Indian startups seeking seed funding for product development and market entry

title: Global Entrepreneurship Olympiad (GEO)
description: International competition for student entrepreneurs to showcase innovative business ideas and compete on a global platform. Multi-stage competition culminating in international finals with focus on entrepreneurial education.
targetAudience: Students and young entrepreneurs looking to compete on global entrepreneurship platform

title: Echelon Asia Summit TOP100 Startups
description: Premier startup competition in Asia featuring the region's most promising startups. Multi-stage selection process identifying top 100 startups across Asia-Pacific, providing exposure to investors and industry leaders.
targetAudience: Promising startups across Asia-Pacific region seeking regional recognition and investment

title: Entrepreneur First Demo Day (Singapore)
description: Startup accelerator program culminating in demo day where teams pitch to investors. EF helps individuals without startup ideas or co-founders to build technology companies from scratch through their unique model.
targetAudience: Ambitious individuals and early-stage technology entrepreneurs in Singapore

title: Singapore Fintech Festival Fintech Awards 2024
description: Annual awards recognizing excellence in fintech innovation across various categories. Part of the world's largest fintech festival, celebrating groundbreaking fintech solutions and industry achievements.
targetAudience: Fintech companies and innovators demonstrating excellence in financial technology solutions

title: LES Business Plan Competition
description: International business plan competition organized by Licensing Executives Society focusing on intellectual property commercialization and technology transfer. Encourages innovative approaches to IP licensing and technology commercialization.
targetAudience: Students and entrepreneurs focused on intellectual property commercialization and licensing

title: Energy Innovation for AI Tech Challenge
description: Challenge focused on innovative energy solutions for AI technologies. Seeks breakthrough solutions addressing the growing energy demands of artificial intelligence infrastructure and computing systems.
targetAudience: Startups and researchers developing energy solutions for AI and computing infrastructure

title: Cyber Startup Challenge 2025
description: Competition focused on cybersecurity startups and innovations. Seeks innovative solutions to address growing cybersecurity challenges and threats in digital transformation era.
targetAudience: Cybersecurity startups and entrepreneurs developing innovative security solutions

title: Conquest by BITS Pilani
description: Annual entrepreneurship and innovation fest organized by BITS Pilani. Features startup competitions, business plan contests, and entrepreneurship challenges for students and early-stage entrepreneurs.
targetAudience: Students and young entrepreneurs participating in innovation and business plan competitions

title: High School Startup League
description: Competition designed for high school students to learn entrepreneurship and build startup ventures. Provides early exposure to entrepreneurial thinking and business development for young minds.
targetAudience: High school students interested in learning entrepreneurship and startup development

title: Innopreneurs Junior Idea Olympiad 2024
description: Innovation competition for young entrepreneurs and students to showcase creative business ideas. Focus on nurturing entrepreneurial mindset among youth through idea development and presentation.
targetAudience: Young students and aspiring entrepreneurs looking to develop and present innovative ideas

title: Titan Design for Impact
description: Innovation challenge focused on design-driven solutions for social and environmental impact. Seeks creative design solutions that address sustainability challenges and create positive social change.
targetAudience: Designers and innovators creating solutions for social and environmental challenges

title: Matrix 2025 Startup Awards
description: Annual startup awards recognizing excellence in innovation and entrepreneurship across various categories. Celebrates outstanding startups and their contributions to technology and business innovation.
targetAudience: Innovative startups across various technology and business sectors

title: ATOM Pre Incubation Program
description: Pre-incubation program by IIIT Bangalore supporting early-stage startups and aspiring entrepreneurs. Provides mentorship, resources, and guidance to help transform ideas into viable business ventures.
targetAudience: Early-stage entrepreneurs and startups seeking pre-incubation support and mentorship

title: NASSCOM Investor Connect Program
description: Program connecting startups with investors and venture capitalists. Facilitates funding opportunities and provides platform for startups to pitch to potential investors in the technology sector.
targetAudience: Technology startups seeking investment and connections with venture capitalists

title: Innopreneurs Startup Contest
description: Startup competition encouraging innovation and entrepreneurship across various sectors. Provides platform for entrepreneurs to showcase their ventures and compete for recognition and prizes.
targetAudience: Entrepreneurs and startups across various sectors seeking recognition and competition platform

title: AMRUT 2.0
description: Government of India's innovation challenge for water and sanitation solutions. Part of the Atal Mission for Rejuvenation and Urban Transformation, seeking innovative solutions for urban water management and sanitation challenges.
targetAudience: Startups and innovators developing solutions for urban water and sanitation challenges

title: Investor Connect by Startup India
description: Government platform connecting startups with investors for funding opportunities. Facilitates introductions between verified startups and accredited investors to boost startup funding ecosystem in India.
targetAudience: Indian startups seeking funding and connections with accredited investors

title: Lilly Solution Accelerator Program
description: T-Hub accelerator program in partnership with Eli Lilly focusing on healthcare and life sciences innovations. Supports startups developing AI and technology solutions to drive healthcare advancements.
targetAudience: Healthcare and life sciences startups developing AI and technology solutions

title: T-Angel Investment Readiness Program
description: T-Hub program preparing startups for investment rounds. Provides training, mentorship, and investor connections to help startups become investment-ready and secure funding.
targetAudience: Startups preparing for investment rounds and seeking funding readiness training

title: BlitZ - 45 Day Sprint to Prototype
description: Intensive 45-day program by T-Hub helping entrepreneurs rapidly develop prototypes and validate their ideas. Fast-paced sprint format focusing on quick iteration and prototype development.
targetAudience: Early-stage entrepreneurs looking to rapidly develop and validate their prototypes

title: NRL Ideathon
description: Innovation challenge organized by Naval Research Laboratory focusing on defense and maritime technology solutions. Seeks innovative ideas addressing naval and defense challenges.
targetAudience: Innovators and researchers developing solutions for defense and maritime applications

title: Startup World Cup by Fintech Festival India
description: Part of Fintech Festival India featuring global startup competition with focus on fintech innovations. Regional competition leading to global Startup World Cup finals.
targetAudience: Fintech startups and financial technology innovators seeking global competition platform

title: Aggnite
description: Agricultural innovation challenge by ICAR promoting technology solutions for agriculture sector. Focuses on innovative agricultural technologies and solutions to address farming challenges.
targetAudience: AgriTech startups and innovators developing solutions for agricultural challenges

title: Nidhi-Prayas
description: Government support program for technology business incubators and startups. Provides funding and support for proof of concept development and early-stage technology ventures.
organizer: Department of Science & Technology, Government of India
targetAudience: Technology startups and innovators seeking proof of concept funding and incubation support

title: Anthill Programs
description: Venture capital and startup accelerator programs focusing on technology ventures. Provides funding, mentorship, and acceleration services to early-stage technology startups.
targetAudience: Early-stage technology startups seeking venture capital funding and acceleration

title: The Purpose Academy
description: Social entrepreneurship education and incubation program focusing on purpose-driven ventures. Supports entrepreneurs building businesses with social and environmental impact.
targetAudience: Social entrepreneurs and impact-driven business builders across Asia

title: 1M1B (1 Million for 1 Billion) Future Readiness Competition
description: Global initiative empowering youth to create solutions for the future. Focuses on preparing young leaders to address global challenges and create positive impact for 1 billion people.
targetAudience: Young leaders and change-makers working on solutions for global challenges

title: National Youth Climate Consortium Fellowship
description: Fellowship program for young climate activists and innovators in India. Focuses on building climate leadership and supporting youth-led climate action initiatives.
targetAudience: Young climate activists and environmental innovators in India

title: Flipkart Tourism Challenge
description: Innovation challenge by Flipkart focusing on tourism and travel technology solutions. Part of Startup India initiatives seeking digital solutions for tourism sector.
targetAudience: Travel tech startups and innovators developing solutions for tourism industry

title: Devfolio Hackathons
description: Platform hosting various hackathons and developer competitions across India. Connects developers with hackathon opportunities and provides tools for organizing tech competitions.
targetAudience: Developers, programmers, and tech enthusiasts participating in hackathons

title: BlockDAG Hackathon 2025
description: Blockchain hackathon focusing on Directed Acyclic Graph (DAG) technology solutions. Challenges developers to build innovative applications using BlockDAG infrastructure.
targetAudience: Blockchain developers and distributed ledger technology enthusiasts

title: CodeBot Hackathon 2025
description: AI and robotics hackathon by ARTPARK focusing on coding solutions for autonomous systems and robotics applications. Combines coding skills with robotics innovation.
targetAudience: Developers and engineers working on AI, robotics, and autonomous systems

title: Suprathon 2025
description: Social good hackathon encouraging developers to build solutions for social impact. Focuses on creating technology solutions that address societal challenges and community needs.
targetAudience: Developers and technologists passionate about creating solutions for social good

title: Lyzr Hackathon
description: AI-focused hackathon by Lyzr challenging developers to build innovative AI applications and solutions. Focuses on practical AI implementations and real-world applications.
targetAudience: AI developers and machine learning enthusiasts building practical AI solutions

title: Bengaluru Tech Summit
description: Annual technology summit in Bengaluru featuring startup showcases, tech competitions, and innovation exhibitions. Major platform for technology ecosystem in Karnataka.
targetAudience: Technology companies, startups, and innovators in Bengaluru and Karnataka

title: CodeCrack Programming Competition
description: Programming competition organized by IEEE FISAT focusing on algorithmic problem solving and competitive programming skills. Part of TechX Quintessence technical fest.
targetAudience: Competitive programmers and computer science students

title: TechnoXian World Cup 9.0
description: Global robotics and technology competition featuring various categories including robotics, AI, and innovation challenges. International platform for technology competitions.
targetAudience: Robotics enthusiasts, technology innovators, and engineering students globally
